title: Will I get ban?
body: I was in a match and then i got disconnected from league because the servers are down.Will i get banned?

replies.body: Your match may have had a hiccup while we went through maintenance for the new patch.  We posted advance noticed through the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page, which I recommend bookmarking for server information.  This isn't something you would receive a ban for.  Just make sure that you are consistently playing without any interruptions to prevent [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)!  Hopefully that helps clear things up!
